Event.title: Our Wedding
Event.subtitle: We invite you to celebrate our wedding

arrival.title: Arrival
arrival.description: If you are staying in the hotel, remember to check in before the ceremony. If you are not staying in the hotel, we recommend you to arrive at least 30 minutes before the ceremony.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: We would like to share with you a very special moment for us. We will be waiting for you in front of the lake.

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: Capture the moment! We will have a photographer during the ceremony and the dinner. We will share the photos with you after the wedding.

dinner.title: Dinner
dinner.description: We will have a dinner after the ceremony. We will have a buffet full of vegan and vegetarian dishes. If you have any food allergies, please let us know.

party.title: Party
party.description: It's time to dance! We will have a DJ playing music and a dance floor waiting for you. We will have a bar with drinks and snacks.

dresscode.title: Dress code
dresscode.description: We want you to feel comfortable. We will be wearing casual clothes. We recommend you to wear comfortable shoes.

RSVP.title: Are you attending?
RSVP.description: Please fill-up the form to notify you that you're attending. Thanks.
